channel.title: Now on GDquest
channel.description: Recent content in Now on GDquest

item.title: What I'm doing now
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: Last update on July 3, 2017 I am near Switzerland, in the French Alps. Lately, I’m: Contributing to the open source game engine Godot Working on a game creation course after a recent success on Kickster Coding a blender add-on to make videos efficiently Working on the GDquest Krita brushes Studying Japanese kanji, at a rate of 1 to 2 every day Trail running and boxing I’m open to collab opportunities with fellow content creators and game creation tutors!
